4.3 DUIM-DCs Module

default-text-style-setter

Generic function

Summary

Sets the default text style.

Signature

default-text-style-setter text-style object => text-style

Arguments

text-style
An instance of type <text-style>.

object
An instance of type <object>.

Values

text-style
An instance of type <text-style>.

Library

duim-dcs

Module

duim-dcs

Description

Sets the default text style.

See also

default-text-style, page 146

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
